p: Hydroalcoholic extracts from vegetable material (leaves and stems) of P. matricarioides collected in the different localities belonging to the three collections were elaborated using a 50% hydroalcoholic mixture as solvent. Briefly, previously powdered sample was extracted by the maceration method, during a period of 7 days, at a temperature of 30 °C ± 2 °C according to the procedure described in the Cuban Standard Norm of Public Health (NRSP) 312 [ 43] and Martinez and Cuéllar [ 17].
